assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: GrowGeneration Corp., through its subsidiaries, owns and operates retail hydroponic and organic gardening stores in the United States. It engages in the marketing and distribution of horticultural, organics, and lighting and hydroponics products, including lighting fixtures, nutrients, seeds and growing media, systems, trays, fans, filters, humidifiers and dehumidifiers, timers, instruments, water pumps, irrigation supplies, and hand tools. The company also operates GrowGen.Pro, an online e-commerce store. The company serves commercial and urban cultivators growing specialty crops, including organics, greens, and plant-based medicines. As of September 15, 2021, it operated a chain of 62 stores, which includes 24 in California, 8 in Colorado, 7 in Michigan, 5 in Maine, 5 in Oklahoma, 4 in Oregon, 3 in Washington, 2 in Nevada, 1 in Arizona, 1 in Rhode Island, 1 in Florida, and 1 in Massachusetts, as well as an online e-commerce store. The company was formerly known as Easylife Corp. GrowGeneration Corp. was founded in 2008 and is based in Greenwood Village, Colorado.
